mean_en: the people who work for an organization or one of the armed forces; the department in a company that deals with employing and training people
sentence: All of the personnel within the business are busy doing their work.
sentence_trans: 公司里所有的员工都忙着做自己的工作。
word_etyma: personn\u003dperson人 + el表名词 → 全体人员
